title: T206 Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder) with Rare El Principe De Gales Back--SGC 40--$1500
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206 Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder) with Rare El Principe De Gales Back--SGC 40--$1500
posts.post_content:
Posted By: James Feagin
One of the more difficult T206 Cobb examples. Has a clean El Principe De Gales back. This cards has absolutely incredible eye appeal and has only a corner crease and soft corners as its only flaws. I'm asking $1500 for this card and it's only available until 9PM EST tonight. Paypal or money order.
Here's a scan of the card when it resided in a PSA 3 holder. It has been since graded by SGC.
